archiefmat.titel: Memories en onuitgegeven werken met de daartoe relatieve stukken
archiefmat.titel_eng: Notes, unpublished essays and related documents
archiefmat.scope: Contains autobiographical notes, (transcripts of) official documents and printed material (brochures, newspapers etc.) regarding the career of the Dutch lawyer A.F. Lammens. Lammens was appointed as a member of the Court of Civil Justice in Suriname in 1815. Later he served as President of the same court, as judge in the Mixed Court for the Suppression of the Slave Trade. and as President Court Martial.
